directions: Cook macaroni in medium saucepan of boiling salted water until just tender but still firm to bite. Drain. Rinse under cold water. Drain well. Transfer macaroni to large bowl. Add tomatoes, green onions, cucumber and corn.

Blend basil, yogurt, mayonnaise, lime juice and garlic in processor until basil is finely chopped. Add basil dressing to macaroni mixture and toss to blend. Season salad with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 4 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
ingredients: 4 medium tomatoes, cut into thin wedges
1 cup thin slices halved English hothouse cucumber
1 cup fresh corn kernels or frozen, thawed
title: Macaroni, Tomato, Corn and Basil Salad
